subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: A first-half run by the Ducks left the Billikens too far behind to extend their emotional season. St. Louis wore patches that read “coach” to honor Coach Rick Majerus, who died in December.
snippet: A first-half run by the Ducks left the Billikens too far behind to extend their emotional season. St. Louis wore patches that read “coach” to honor Coach Rick Majerus, who died in December.
